TopicTitle: mission Impossible? test a separator at a certain altitude in gilly

Articles.Content:
the mission says that I have to test a separator, in a suborbital trajectory, over gilly, at a height of 120k / 130k. but gilly's maximum altitude is 113k, if I get higher than that I get out of his gravitational field.
What am I supposed to do?

 

Edited July 8, 2021 by jaunco325

That does look like a bug: officially, Gilly's SOI is a little bit over 126km, but that's counted from the center of the planet. Remove a body radius of 13km and the sphere shrinks. I believe the game though that it is in fact 126km so it set up a contract that fits there, as you said, between 120 and 130.
